title: Riscatype Temple script digital version?
content:
Hello All,

I have purchased a fount of the Temple script metal typeface (for my amateurish attempts at letterpress) and am wondering if this exists in a digital version? I have looked through Mike Yanega's script guide but I confess I got lost in the bewildering array of formal script typefaces there.

Attached is a sample from the Riscatype catalogue. Many thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [temple.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820094319/http:/typophile.com/files/temple.jpg) | 116.52 KB |
author: Atwe

comments.content:
I would have put this in Part 2 or Part 4. I just searched both of them and the closest I found were Derby and Diskus, but neither was a match. This is a new one to me.

- Mike Yanega
